name: Takizakura Girls' Academy Idol Club
description: 滝桜芸能コースアイドル部 Takizakura Geinō Kōsu Aidoru Bu The Takizakura Girls' Academy Idol Club, also known as the Takizakura Performing Arts Course Idol Club was an idol group led and formed by the Takizawa family in Love Live! School Idol Musical. They were the idol group of Takizakura Girls' Academy prior to the combined annexation of the two schools in the series finale which led to both the creation of Tsubaki Takizakura Girls' High School and it's school idol club. The group consisted of ten members.
